product_description.product_name: MortamixÂ® Rainbow Custom Color Masonry Cement
product_description.usage: Formulated cementitious material for producing masonry mortars for brick, block, and stone masonry units, and stucco.
product_description.composition: Combination of portland cement, plasticizers, ground limestone, air entraining additives, and inorganic oxide color pigments.
product_description.types: Type N, Type S, Type M
product_description.colors: Available in many standard colors, including white, and can be custom formulated.

installation.preparatory_work: Mix according to ASTM C270. Machine mixing recommended.
installation.batching_sequence: Add 3/4 of mix water, 1/2 sand, 1 bag cement, rest of sand, and remaining water. Mix 3-5 minutes.

precautions: Never change sand sources or mortar mixture proportion volumes during the project.
Do not use other additives or admixtures.
Do not use acid-based cleaning solutions.
Erect a job-specific sample panel for appearance verification.
transport_and_installation.safety_precautions: Refer to Safety Data Sheet (SDS). Avoid direct contact with skin. Use proper PPE.
transport_and_installation.storage_and_handling: Store above ground on pallets, cover with tarps, prevent moisture contact, allow air circulation.

additional_info.availability_and_cost: Regionally available. Contact nearest sales office for pricing.
additional_info.warranty: Material Certification Reports available upon request. No guarantee on finish work.
